1    | /*---------------------------------------
2    |   WN_LOC.C
3    | ---------------------------------------*/
4    | 
5    | #include "video/v_video.h"
6    | #include "window.h"
7    | 
8    | 
9    | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
10   |    FUNCTION: wn_locate()
11   |     PURPOSE: Locate cursor in window
12   |      SYNTAX: int wn_locate(WINDOW *w, int row, int col);
13   | DESCRIPTION: Set cursor on position (row,col) relative to window's
14   |              origin ( (0,0) = upper lefthand corner).
15   |              N.B. Window w will become the top window.
16   |     RETURNS: TRUE, or FALSE if error
17   |     HISTORY: 910709 V0.1 - Initial version (always returns TRUE)
18   |              14-Oct-1993 V0.2 - Now w->x2 and w->y2 are maximum limits.
19   |                                 0,0 is minimum limit
20   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
21   | int wn_locate(WINDOW *w, int row, int col)
22   | {
23   |   /*------------------------
24   |     Check if window opened
25   |   --------------------------*/
26   |   if (!w)
27   |     return(NO_WINDOW);
28   | 
29   |   /*------------------
30   |     Activate window
31   |   -------------------*/
32   |   if (w!=top_window)
33   |     wn_top(w);
34   | 
35   |   /*------------------------
36   |     Check cursor position
37   |   ------------------------*/
38   |   if (row > w->y2)
39   |     row = w->y2;
40   |   if (col > w->x2)
41   |     col = w->x2;
42   |   if (row < 0)
43   |     row = 0;
44   |   if (col < 0)
45   |     col = 0;
46   | 
47   |   /*------------------------------
48   |     Set window cursor coordinates
49   |   --------------------------------*/
50   |   w->ccx = w->x1 + col;
51   |   w->ccy = w->y1 + row;
52   | 
53   |   /*----------------------
54   |     Set cursor in window
55   |   -----------------------*/
56   |   v_setcurpos(w->ccy,w->ccx);
57   |   if (w->synflg)
58   |     v_cursoron();
59   |   else
60   |     v_cursoroff();
61   | 
62   |   return(TRUE);
63   | }
